channel.description: Recent content in hot on Strategineer

item.title: Shrimp Tacos
item.description: The lettuce can be replaced with thinly sliced cabbage The guacamole can be made by doubling the ingredients in the following recipe Taco seasoning is made with: 2 teaspoons ancho chili powder 2 teaspoons ground cumin 2 teaspoons smoked paprika (or use regular) 2 teaspoons granulated garlic 1 teaspoon ground coriander 1/2 teaspoon Mexican oregano (dried) 1/4 teaspoon sea salt 1/4 teaspoon black pepper 1/16 teaspoon chipotle powder (skip for no heat or more for higher heat)
